Translations.Text: O people hic est parable ut vos ponder carefully idols vos set DEUS nunquam create fly et they manus unus perfecit ita! Furthermore si fly steals anything ex them they non recover it infirmus est pursuer the pursued
They non value DEUS prout He valued DEUS est the Multus Powerful Almighty
DEUS chooses EX angels messengers ALIAS PROUT EX people DEUS est Hearer Seer
He knows their elapsus their future To DEUS belongs ultimate control totus matters
O vos believe vos bow prostrate worship tuus Dominus work righteousness ut vos succeed
Vos strive causa DEUS vos strive His causa. He chosen vos non locus hardship
